summary: Feature request to add serialization context support for codecs and converters in TypeScript SDK, with specific requirements for Nexus integration. References design discussion in the features repository.
userImpact: Users need the ability to pass serialization context through codecs and converters, which is required for proper Nexus support in the TypeScript SDK.
proposedFix: Implement serialization context parameter for codecs and converters, ensuring Nexus is properly integrated as discussed in features#678.
keyQuote: Make sure to include nexus per https://github.com/temporalio/features/issues/678
